title: Summoner ID number?
body: I just wanted to know how I figure out what my ID # is. Thank you.

replies.body: What is a Summoner ID, and what would one do with it?     ¯\_(シ)_/¯  This is some API magic I don't know about!  You may want to ask the community of [API developers](https://developer.riotgames.com/discussion/index) who might know more!  You can also find it at our [privacy ](https://privacy.riotgames.com/en_US/)page.  Hope that helps!
